data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Saint Catherine, Jamaica.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Catherine, Jamaica
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Saint Catherine, Jamaica. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, please raise up prophets in Saint Catherine who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 520,900 people living in the state of Saint Catherine.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Old Harbour
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Old Harbour, Saint Catherine, Jamaica.
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Saint Catherine, Jamaica will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Saint Catherine, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Saint Catherine, Jamaica to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

location.name: Saint Catherine
location.cities_list: Spanish Town, Old Harbour, Bog Walk, Old Harbour Bay, Point Hill
location.cities_list_w_pop: Spanish Town (145,018), Old Harbour (26,024), Bog Walk (12,873), Old Harbour Bay (7,912), Point Hill (5,344)
